additional_credentials.notes: Type of additional credential (Membership, License, Certificate, Degree/Diploma).
additional_credentials.help_text: Select the type of additional credential.

additional_credentials.notes: Name of the organization issuing the credential.
additional_credentials.help_text: Enter the name of the organization.

additional_credentials.notes: ID number for the credential (if applicable).

additional_credentials.help_text: Enter the year credential was issued (YYYY).

personal_data.description: Personal and professional details for your public profile.

personal_data.help_text: Check to display your title on your profile.
Enter your middle name or initial.

personal_data.notes: e.g., LPC, LCSW, PsyD. User can enter multiple credentials.
personal_data.help_text: Specify all credentials to be included after your name (PhD, PsyD, LCSW, etc.).

personal_data.notes: Upload a profile photo for your public profile.
personal_data.help_text: Upload your profile photo (JPG, PNG, GIF, max 5MB).

fees.notes: Cost for an individual therapy session. Specify currency and amount.
fees.help_text: Enter the cost for an individual session (e.g., $150).

fees.notes: Cost for a couples therapy session. Specify currency and amount.
fees.help_text: Enter the cost for a couples session (e.g., $200).

fees.notes: Does the therapist offer sliding scale pricing?
fees.help_text: Check if you offer sliding scale pricing.

website.help_text: Enter your practice website URL (e.g., https://yourpractice.com).
Enter your Facebook profile or page URL.
Enter your YouTube channel or video URL.

communities_served.notes: Types of participants served (Individual, Couples, Family, Group).
communities_served.help_text: Select all participant types you serve.

communities_served.notes: Age groups served (Toddler, Children (6-10), Preteen, Teen, Adults, Elders (65+)).
communities_served.help_text: Select all age groups you serve.

education.help_text: Enter the name of the school you most recently graduated from.
Enter the year you began professional practice (YYYY).

professional_insurance.notes: National Provider Identifier (10 digits). Not publicly visible.
Name of your malpractice insurance carrier. Not publicly visible.
professional_insurance.help_text: Enter your malpractice insurance carrier name.

professional_insurance.notes: Expiration date of malpractice insurance (MM/YYYY). Not publicly visible.

specialties_expertise.notes: Select multiple areas of expertise. Therapists can choose from a list or add their own.
specialties_expertise.help_text: Select all areas of expertise that apply. You may add your own.

specialties_expertise.notes: Star up to 5 top specialties. These will be highlighted on the therapist's profile.
specialties_expertise.help_text: Star up to 5 specialties as your top areas of focus.

location.notes: Check if this is your primary location. Only one can be primary.
location.help_text: Check if this is your primary address.

location.notes: Name of your practice or office.
location.help_text: Enter the name of your practice.

location.notes: Suite, unit, or additional address info.

location.help_text: Enter your zip or postal code.

location.notes: Hide this address from public profile and search.
location.help_text: Check to hide this address from public view.

new_client_intro.notes: Therapist describes when, where, and how they offer therapy.
new_client_intro.default: I offer therapy sessions in-person, on the world's softest sofa, or online via video. I'm available most weekdays and in the evenings.
new_client_intro.help_text: Describe your therapy session options, locations, and availability.

insurance.notes: Select all in-network insurance providers. You may add custom values.
insurance.help_text: Select all in-network insurance providers. Use 'Other' to add custom values.
Check if you accept out-of-network benefits.

gallery.notes: Upload multiple photos for your profile gallery.
gallery.help_text: Upload up to 10 photos (JPG, PNG, GIF).

gallery.notes: Upload multiple videos for your profile gallery.
gallery.help_text: Upload up to 5 videos (MP4, MOV, AVI).

availability.notes: Select how you provide therapy sessions.
availability.validation: ^(Both Online and In Person|Online Only|In Person Only)$

availability.notes: Current status for accepting new clients.
Does the therapist offer a free 15 minute introductory call?
availability.help_text: Check if you offer a free 15 minute intro call.

finance_note.notes: Short note for clients about fees, insurance, or payment policies. Displayed in the finances section.
finance_note.help_text: Briefly describe how you charge or handle insurance.

therapy_types_note.notes: Short note that appears on your profile alongside your therapy types. Use this to provide extra details or context about your treatment approaches.
therapy_types_note.help_text: Add any extra details or context about your therapy types to help clients understand your approach.

email.notes: Primary email, set at registration. Read-only.
email.help_text: Your main email address (cannot be changed here).

email.notes: Optional: front office or admin email for notifications.
email.help_text: Enter an office or admin email to receive notifications.

email.notes: Allow clients to email you directly.
email.help_text: Check to allow clients to email you.

email.notes: Receive an email notification when a client calls.
email.help_text: Check to receive an email when a client calls you.

primary_credential.notes: Month and year of license expiration (MM/YYYY).

primary_credential.help_text: Select the state where your license is issued.

bio.notes: What inspired you to become a therapist? (Combined for display)
bio.help_text: Share what inspired you to pursue this profession.

bio.notes: What is your approach to helping clients? (Combined for display)
bio.help_text: Describe your approach to therapy and client care.

bio.notes: What do you want clients to know about working with you? (Combined for display)
bio.help_text: Share what clients should expect when working with you.

types_of_therapy.notes: Select all types of therapy you offer. This is a lookup field and can be updated as new modalities are added.
types_of_therapy.help_text: Select all therapy types you offer.

types_of_therapy.notes: Other treatment options offered. User can enter multiple single-line values.
types_of_therapy.help_text: Enter any other treatment options you offer (one per line).

credentials_note.notes: Short note that appears on your profile alongside your credentials. Use this to give confidence to your clients with any extra details about your qualifications.
credentials_note.help_text: Add any extra details about your qualifications to give clients confidence.

phone.notes: Allow clients to call this number.
phone.help_text: Check to allow clients to call this number.

phone.notes: Allow clients to send texts when emailing or calling.
phone.help_text: Check to allow clients to send texts to your mobile number.

payment_method.notes: Select all payment methods you accept.
payment_method.help_text: Select all payment methods you accept.

specialties_note.notes: Short note that appears on your profile alongside your specialties. Use this to provide extra details or context about your areas of expertise.
specialties_note.help_text: Add any extra details or context about your specialties to help clients understand your expertise.

my_identity.notes: Therapist's date of birth. Not publicly visible, used for search only.
Therapist's gender identity. Not publicly visible, used for search only.
Therapist's race/ethnicity. Not publicly visible, used for search only.
Therapist's faith/religion. Not publicly visible, used for search only.
Therapist's LGBTQIA+ identity. Not publicly visible, used for search only.
Other identity attributes. Not publicly visible, used for search only.
